Privacy Policy – CutDigitalWaste.com

Effective Date: September 15, 2025

Operated by: Scandic Cloud Solutions AS, Org No. [Insert Number], Norway

1. Introduction

Welcome to CutDigitalWaste.com. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of information we collect, how we use and protect that information, and your rights concerning your personal data. This website is a property of Scandic Cloud Solutions AS.

2. Information We Collect

When you visit our site or submit a form, we may collect the following types of information:

  • Personal Information: This includes data you voluntarily provide, such as your name, email address, phone number, company name, and job role.
  • Form and Scheduling Data: Information you submit through audit request forms (Tally/Typeform) and Calendly bookings.
  • Technical and Usage Data: We may automatically collect information about your device and how you interact with our website, including your IP address, browser type, and usage data, through third-party services like Google Analytics or Facebook Pixel.

3. Purpose of Data Collection

The information we collect is used for the following purposes:

  • To provide and fulfill your request for a free or paid Digital Waste Audit.
  • To follow up on audit results or to discuss potential services.
  • To send you relevant insights, downloads, or consulting materials.
  • To improve the functionality of our website and to target relevant advertising.

4. Data Sharing and Disclosure

We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties.

We may share your information with trusted service providers (e.g., email tools, CRM, analytics) solely for the purpose of conducting our business operations.

5. Use of Cookies and Tracking Technologies

We use cookies and tracking pixels for analytics and to measure campaign performance. You can manage and disable cookies through your browser settings at any time.

6. Your Data Protection Rights

If you are in the EU, under GDPR, you have the right to:

  • Request access to your personal data.
  • Request the correction, deletion, or restriction of your data.
  • Opt out of marketing communications at any time.

For any of these requests, please contact us at: privacy@scandiccloud.com

7. Policy Changes

We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information.

8. Contact Information

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

Scandic Cloud Solutions AS

📍 Oslo, Norway

📧 info@cutdigitalwaste.com

🌐 www.cutdigitalwaste.com

© 2025 Scandic Cloud Solutions AS. All Rights Reserved. Privacy Policy | Terms of Use

This website uses cookies

We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve collected from your use of their services. Show details

Show details

Cookie Details

Strictly Necessary Cookies – Essential for the website to function.

Performance Cookies – Collect info about how visitors use our site.

Functionality Cookies – Remember user choices for enhanced functionality.

Targeting/Advertising Cookies – Deliver relevant ads and track performance.

You can manage your preferences through browser settings or by contacting our support.
